segments.text: How many parking tickets have you gotten before ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've gotten a few parking tickets before .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you paid off your parking tickets ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much do you have to pay for the ticket ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If I remember correctly , it's about $ 130 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I got one the other day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , you better make sure you pay it off .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I may just go to the DMV today , so I can pay the fine .
segments.speaker: S2
